description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' using Google Mock for testing, which mimics the interfaces WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell and WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink. It provides mock methods for various service-related functionalities.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for testing the WPEFramework plugin shell and ICOMLink interfaces.

methods.name: ~ServiceMock
methods.description: Destructor for ServiceMock class.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Mock method returning the version string.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Mock method returning the locator string.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Mock method returning the class name.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Mock method returning the callsign.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Mock method returning the web prefix.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Mock method returning configuration line.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Mock method returning persistent path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Mock method returning volatile path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Mock method returning data path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Mock method returning current state.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Mock method indicating if resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Mock method checking support for a feature.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Mock method to enable web server.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Mock method to disable web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Mock method returning subsystems interface.

methods.description: Mock method for querying interface by callsign.

methods.description: Mock method to register a notification.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Mock method returning model information.

methods.description: Mock method indicating background status.

methods.description: Mock method returning hash key.

methods.description: Mock method for string substitution.

methods.description: Mock method to activate with reason.

methods.description: Mock method to deactivate with reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Mock method indicating unavailability with reason.

methods.description: Mock method returning reason for state change.

methods.description: Mock method setting config line with a string parameter.

methods.description: Mock method returning system root path.

methods.description: Mock method returning start mode result.

methods.description: Mock method returning resume result.

methods.description: Mock method retrieving metadata.
